description.koreana: 게임 내의 모든 숨겨진 성지를 찾아내십시오

description.english: Survive a combat encounter with only 1 party member standing
description.german: Überlebe einen Kampf, bei dem nur ein Gruppenmitglied
description.french: Survivre à un combat avec seulement 1 membre de l'équipe
description.spanish: Sobrevive un encuentro con sólo 1 miembro del equipo en pie
description.polish: Przetrwaj walkę z jednym jedynym żywym strażnikiem.
description.russian: Закончите бой с одним выжившим членом команды.
description.turkish: Bir dövüşte takımın sadece tek bir üyesinin ayakta kalmasıyla sağ kurtul
description.italian: Sopravvivi a un combattimento con un solo membro del gruppo
description.koreana: 일행이 단 1명만 살아남은 채로 전투 인카운터에서 살아남으십시오

description.english: Accidentally kill a party member with friendly fire
description.german: Töte aus Versehen ein Mitglied deiner Gruppe
description.french: Tuer accidentellement un membre de l'équipe avec un tir ami
description.spanish: Mata accidentalmente a un compañero de equipo con fuego amigo
description.polish: Zabij przez przypadek członka swojej drużyny, prowadząc bratobójczy ogień.
description.russian: Убейте члена команды дружественным огнем.
description.turkish: Kazara takım arkadaşlarından birini vurarak öldür
description.italian: Uccidi per sbaglio un membro del gruppo con il fuoco amico
description.koreana: 아군 사격으로 일행 한 명을 실수로 죽이십시오

description.english: Read every lore entry in the game
description.german: Lese jeden Wissenseintrag des Spiels
description.french: Lire tout le savoir écrit du jeu
description.spanish: Lee cada entrada del lore del juego
description.polish: Przeczytaj wszystkie zapiski historyczne w grze.
description.russian: Прочтите каждую запись о мире игры.
description.turkish: Oyundaki bütün veri kayıtlarını oku
description.italian: Leggi tutti i documenti presenti nel gioco

description.english: Repair 10 locks or safes using Mechanical Repair
description.german: Repariere 10 Schlösser oder Safes mit "Mechanische Reparatur"
description.french: Réparer 10 serrures ou coffres en utilisant Mécano
description.spanish: Repara 10 cerraduras o cajas fuertes usando Reparación Mecánica
description.polish: Napraw 10 zamków lub sejfów przy użyciu umiejętności „mechanik”.
description.russian: Отремонтируйте 10 замков или сейфов, используя навык "Механика".
description.turkish: Mekanik Onarımı kullanarak 10 tane kilit veya kasa tamir et
description.italian: Ripara 10 serrature o casseforti usando l'abilità Meccanico
description.koreana: 기계 수리공으로 10개의 자물쇠 혹은 금고를 수리하십시오

description.english: Go to Los Angeles
description.german: Gehe nach Los Angeles
description.french: Aller à Los Angeles
description.spanish: Ve a Los Ángeles
description.polish: Dotrzyj do Los Angeles.
description.russian: Отправьтесь в Лос-Анджелес.
description.turkish: Los Angeles'e git
description.italian: Vai a Los Angeles

displayName.spanish: De vuelta a donde todo empezó
displayName.italian: Di nuovo dove tutto ha avuto inizio

description.english: Return to Arizona
description.german: Kehre nach Arizona zurück
description.french: Retour en Arizona
description.spanish: Vuelve a Arizona
description.polish: Wroć do Arizony.
description.russian: Вернитесь в Аризону.
description.turkish: Arizona'ya dön
description.italian: Ritorna in Arizona

description.english: Allow Vargas to detonate the nuke
description.german: Erlaube Vargas, die Atombombe zu detonieren
description.french: Laisser Vargas faire exploser la bombe
description.spanish: Permite que Vargas detone la bomba nuclear
description.polish: Pozwól Vargasowi zdetonować atomówkę.
description.russian: Позвольте Варгасу взорвать ядерную бомбу.
description.turkish: Vargas'ın nükleer bombayı patlatmasına izin ver
description.italian: Permetti a Vargas di far detonare la bomba

description.english: You foolishly pushed the button in the Hollywood Sewers
description.german: Du hast den Knopf in der Kanalisation von Hollywood gedrückt. Dämlicherweise.
description.french: Vous avez bêtement appuyé sur le bouton dans les égouts de Hollywood
description.spanish: Pulsaste estúpidamente el botón en las cloacas de Hollywood
description.polish: Wygłup się i naciśnij guzik w kanałach Hollywood.
description.russian: Вы опрометчиво нажали на кнопку в голливудской канализации.
description.turkish: Salakça hareket edip Hollywood kanalizasyonundaki düğmeye bastın
description.italian: Hai scioccamente premuto il pulsante che si trova nelle fogne di Hollywood
